message.body: IT WAS YOUR BIRTHDAY ON WEDNESDAY?! I didn't know!! Happy belated birthday! We should definitely hang out and I can buy you a drink!
Thank you thank you! No worries ! I didn't do much for it
Right of course that's what I meant!
I can't drink BUT you can buy me a hot chocolate lol
I will pick up cards today and come By and drop them off if they look ok
So See you soon
Okay. I have to leave my house by 1:30 so if you can, come before then. If not, we could chill tonight and you can give me it then -- whatever works
Alright text me whenever you're free
Let's do tonight!
How is 6?
The cards are too purple and too thin but maybe useable
For now
We are resending them after Sofie talks to them about color issues
But for now I'm still going to give you half of these
Aw man I can't do 6! I was hoping you would want to meet like around 8 haha
Is that possible?
Totally possible
Can do tomorrow during day too
I'll text later on
Yeah great! 8 or later tonight would be better :)

If I brought my laptop, could we even meet for an hour tonight? And talk marketing real quick, since I'm driving all the way to you? I have a project I'd like to work on with you that is Bonnie marketing related. We will track your hours for reimbursement.
Or we can do this when I come back
We can do it in your apt even
If you have wireless I can connect to
Say at 9?
Or ten even. Whatever works for you
Hi sorry! I didn't check my phone -- yes 9 is perfect. We can talk Bonnie stuff and then go out somewhere so I can buy you a hot chocolate hahaha
Haha ok. What is your address again?
This is also very random but I need to go to walmart after our meeting to buy an ez pass for my ny trip so if you want a ride to Walmart and back, let me know too
Yeah sure! I'll come with yo u
I don't see you!
I'm apartment c
Here!
Parked on side street
Walking to you
